section.para: To edit an Order selected for billing, or to view detailed information about selected Orders, choose the "Billing Edit List" option. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: In cases where a large number of Orders have been selected for billing, data may be slow to display on the Billing Edit List--given the quantity of detail provided. For a faster-loading view of the same Orders, use the Billing Selections list, which provides only higher level details and so loads more quickly.

section.para: The Billing Edit List displays details on all Orders selected for billing. The display is a nested list, with a plus ("+") sign located to the far left of the screen next to each line that may be expanded to lower levels. By clicking your mouse on a plus sign, you reveal lower levels of information related to the Order.

tip.para: If a Billing record displays in red type, this means an Account Assignment is missing for the Customer Type in question. To correct the problem, check your Sales Account and Accounts Receivable Assignments. Once the Assignments are in place, the record will display in black type.
